abstract.t: The issue concerns auditing financial records from several sources over time. To validate proper legal money usage and flow is a difficult task. Each financial institution has non-common reporting methods. Seek to create a common export record to merge transactions and easily sort by date, time, and institution. The first goal is to create a traceability file of transactions. The second goal is to create a "simple" standard record for "anyone" to sift and sort records.
